mainSequence.step: Manager requests to view product prices.
UI Dashboard receives the request to view product prices.
UI Dashboard sends a GET request to Backend API for product prices.
Backend API activates and receives the GET request.
Backend API fetches the prices of products from the Database.
Database activates and returns the prices of products to Backend API.
Backend API deactivates after receiving the prices from Database.
Backend API sends the product prices data to UI Dashboard.
UI Dashboard receives the product prices data from Backend API.
UI Dashboard displays the product prices to the Manager.
